catalogue_raissonne: Hind 53 iii or iv/iv; B. 263; Holl. 263 iii or iv/iv; Mz.46 iii or iv/iv; B-B. 31-J iv/iv
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
text: Like other artists of his time, Rembrandt used real models to sit for imaginary portraits. This model reappears in many prints and paintings by Rembrandt and other artists in his circle.
title: Bearded Man in Furred Oriental Cap and Robe: Half-Length
